project_plan.name: Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where a player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Create a system for picking up items
Implement inventory management to view collected items
Design simple challenges for player interaction in rooms
Write tests for player navigation, item pickup, inventory management, and challenges
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
